comments:
Hello,

I cannot run anymore my application inside Eclipse 3.0M7 (while it was possible 
with M6).
After searching where the problem lies we found out the next thing.
When in the required plugins tree, there are n paths to the same plugin 
(containing already jars) then the classpath of the Java Application contains n 
times the jars mentionned.
As we have a lot of similar things in our application, the classpath becomes so 
long that we get the following error (where the classpath is truncated and the 
exit code of the process is not visible):

java.io.IOException: CreateProcess: C:\LOCALAPP\apps\JVM1.4.1_02
\jre\bin\javaw.exe -classpath 
C:\LOCALAPP\apps\workspaces\PluginDevWks\dexia.foxe.engine\bin;C:\LOCALAPP\apps\
workspaces\PluginDevWks\dexia.foxe.remainder\bin;C:\LOCALAPP\apps\workspaces\Plu
ginDevWks\dexia.foxe.browserbase\bin;C:\LOCALAPP\apps\workspaces\PluginDevWks\de
xia.foxe.base\bin;C:\LOCALAPP\apps\workspaces\PluginDevWks\dexia.gemk.tree\bin;C
:\LOCALAPP\apps\eclipse2.1.1\plugins\org.eclipse.core.boot_2.1.1
\boot.jar;C:\LOCALAPP\apps\eclipse2.1.1\plugins\org.eclipse.core.runtime_2.1.1
\runtime.jar;C:\LOCALAPP\apps\workspaces\PluginDevWks\JarsOperations\dexia.agb0.
jar;C:\LOCALAPP\apps\workspaces\PluginDevWks\JarsOperations\dexia.agv7.jar;C:\LO
CALAPP\apps\workspaces\PluginDevWks\JarsOperations\dexia.foxe.catalogue.jar;C:\L
OCALAPP\apps\workspaces\PluginDevWks\JarsOperations\dexia.fidx.jar;C:\LOCALAPP\a
pps\workspaces\PluginDevWks\JarsOperations\dexia.firr.jar;C:\LOCALAPP\apps\works
paces\PluginDevWks\JarsOperations\dexia.firr.operationlayer.jar;C:\LOCALAPP\apps
\workspac”
	at java.lang.Win32Process.create(Native Method)
	at java.lang.Win32Process.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Runtime.execInternal(Native Method)
	at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin.exec(DebugPlugin.java:571)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.launching.AbstractVMRunner.exec
(AbstractVMRunner.java:70)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.launching.StandardVMRunner.run
(StandardVMRunner.java:241)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.launching.JavaLocalApplicationLaunchConfigurationDelega
te.launch(JavaLocalApplicationLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:120)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch
(LaunchConfiguration.java:157)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch
(DebugUIPlugin.java:778)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools.buildAndLaunch
(DebugUITools.java:628)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools$3.run(DebugUITools.java:584)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)

Thanks for considering this blocking problem for me
Jacques
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 51533 ***
